title.en: An Aspiration Prayer of the Three Yogas

text.en: Gurus and hosts of yidam deities, turn your attention towards us!
text.en-trans: lama yidam lhatsok gong su sol

text.en: These positive actions we have accomplished through our efforts today,
text.en-trans: deng dir tsönpé drubpé gewa dang

text.en: All the merit we accumulate throughout the three times and all the virtue that exists,
text.en-trans: dü sum sak dang yöpé gewa nam

text.en: All gathered together, we now dedicate towards great and unsurpassed awakening!
text.en-trans: dom té lamé changchub chenpor ngo

text.en: From now until we reach the heart of enlightenment,
text.en-trans: deng né changchub nyingpor chi kyi bar

text.en: May we be born in a good family, be intelligent and free from pride,
text.en-trans: rik zang losal ngagyal mepa dang

text.en: May we have great compassion, and devotion to the teacher,
text.en-trans: nyingjé ché zhing lama la gü den

text.en: And confidently follow the glorious Vajra Vehicle!
text.en-trans: palden dorjé tek la ngé né shok

text.en: Matured through empowerment and keeping the commitments of samaya,
text.en-trans: wang gi min ching damtsik dompar den

text.en: On the path of the two stages1may we complete ‘approach’ and ‘accomplishment’,
text.en-trans: rim nyi lam la nyendrub tarchin té

text.en: May we attain the vidyādhara levels2without difficulty,
text.en-trans: kawa mepar rigdzin gopang drö

text.en: And easily achieve the two types of accomplishment!
text.en-trans: ngödrub nam nyi delak drub gyur chik

text.en: May all appearances be realized as perfect, the mandala of the Net of Magical Illusion,
text.en-trans: chir nang gyutrul drawé khorlor dzok

text.en: All sounds as the inexpressible sound of mantra,
text.en-trans: drakpa tamché jödral ngak kyi dra

text.en: All movement of mind as uncompounded self-knowing awareness,
text.en-trans: sem kyi gyuwa rangrig dümajé

text.en: And may we realize the great bliss that is beyond union and separation!
text.en-trans: dechen dudral mepar ngöngyur shok

text.en: Without rejecting impairments and breakages, thoughts and obscurations, may they be purified in their own state.
text.en-trans: nyamchak tok drib mapang né su dak

text.en: Through realizing outer, inner and secret to be inseparable, may the samaya commitments be fulfilled.
text.en-trans: chi nang sangwa yermé tokpé kang

text.en: May whatever arises in the mind be liberated by itself in the vast expanse of Samantabhadra,
text.en-trans: gangshar rangdrol kunzang long yang su

text.en: May the lower realms be emptied from their depths, and may we realize the equality of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa!
text.en-trans: ngensong dongtruk sizhi nyam gyur chik

text.en: Within the Great Sphere the kāyas and buddha fields are perfectly complete,
text.en-trans: tiklé chenpor ku dang zhingkham dzok

text.en: Within the Great Samaya the concepts of abandoning and adopting are purified,
text.en-trans: damtsik chenpor panglang tsenma dak

text.en: Within the Great All-Pervasiveness the knot of hope and fear is loosed,
text.en-trans: khyabdal chenpor redok düpa drol

text.en: Within the Great Perfection may we actualize the dharmakāya!
text.en-trans: dzogpachenpor chöku ngöngyur shok

text.en: May the blessings of the three lineages3enter our hearts,
text.en-trans: gyüpa sum gyi jinlab nying la zhuk

text.en: And the secret path of the Net of Magical Illusion be perfected in our minds.
text.en-trans: gyutrul drawé lam sang sem la dzok

text.en: Through the spontaneous accomplishment of the four activities,
text.en-trans: trinlé nam zhi lhün gyi drubpa yi

text.en: May we liberate the infinity of beings!
text.en-trans: muta mepé drowa drolwar shok

text.en: May the mandalas of peaceful and wrathful emanations guide us with predictions,
text.en-trans: zhitro trulpé khorlö lung tön zhing

text.en: The ḍākinīs protect us as their own child,
text.en-trans: khandro nam kyi bu zhin kyongwa dang

text.en: And the Dharma protectors and guardians dispel all obstacles;
text.en-trans: chökyong sungmé barché kün sal né

text.en: May all our aspirations be fulfilled!
text.en-trans: yi la mönpa tadak drub gyur chik

text.en: May the teachings of the buddhas flourish and spread far and wide,
text.en-trans: gyalwé tenpa dar zhing gyepa dang

text.en: May the aspirations of all the holders of the teachings be fulfilled,
text.en-trans: tendzin nam kyi zhepé dön kün drub

text.en: May each and every being be freed from all adversity,
text.en-trans: malü kyegü galkyen kün zhi zhing

text.en: And may they receive all that is excellent just as they desire!
text.en-trans: püntsok tadak yizhin jor gyur chik
